Literature.Title: Unnatural amino acid analogues of membrane-active helical peptides with anti-mycobacterial activity and improved stability.
Literature.Author: Khara JS, Priestman M, Uhía I, Hamilton MS, Krishnan N, Wang Y, Yang YY, Langford PR, Newton SM, Robertson BD, Ee PL

Literature.Title: Designing α-helical peptides with enhanced synergism and selectivity against Mycobacterium smegmatis: Discerning the role of hydrophobicity and helicity.
Literature.Author: Khara JS, Lim FK, Wang Y, Ke XY, Voo ZX, Yang YY, Lakshminarayanan R, Ee PL

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>1000 µg/ml,Rat erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=>500 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC=125µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 173(MIC=>500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 212(MIC=>500µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis 411(MIC=250µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis CSU87(MIC=250µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis ATCC 14468(MIC=62.5µg/ml)
